Texts.Chs:
这些拥有智慧的人形黄蜂拥有自己的蜂巢，能够在在空中自如地飞来飞去。

^orange;食性^reset;：肉类，糖和水果。

^orange;天赋^reset;:
抗性：生命值上限^green;+15^reset;%，速度^green;+8^reset;%，坠落速度^green;-39^reset;，增加跳跃速度
免疫：狂乱
科技：滑翔，多段跳，蹬墙跳

^orange;武器^reset;:
匕首: 伤害^green;+25^reset;%

^red;弱点^reset;:
减益：能量值上限^red;-16.5^reset;%
抗性：火焰抗性^red;-50^reset;%，寒冷抗性^red;-50^reset;%
^red;糟糕的游泳者^reset;
Texts.Eng:
These humanoid, sapient wasps are each their own hive, and are handy in the air.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;:  Raw Meat, Sugars, Fruits

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  From race mod: Flight, Multijump, Wallslide
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;
  -^green;39^reset;Fall Speed. Increased Jump Speed
  +^green;8^reset;% Speed,
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Insanity
  ^cyan;Resist^reset;: +^green;15^reset;% Physical

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  ^red;Poor Liquid Traversal^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Dagger: Damage x^green;1.25^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;83.5^reset;
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Fire, Ice
